ygData.subject: Re: Nicademous Where are you?????
ygData.msgSnippet: aiyo... u never been a dark race b4 u wont understand one lah.... i must spend days working on factions then i can be dubious... not even able to bank or
ygData.messageBody:
aiyo... u never been a dark race b4 u wont understand one lah....

i must spend days working on factions then i can be dubious... not even able
to bank or buy/sell stuff... n there bound to be some asshole paladin that
KOS me... so i rather do those stuff in a place i can trust... i can
buy/sell at the centaur area.... but bankwise need to go oggok....

treatns is safer... treants is good marnee... treants is reasonably good
exp... heheh.. since i can riase to like level 34 with treants... BUT most
likely not lah... maybe 30 then i will move to druids...

those low level chars with FBR or Oracle Robe usually is bcos they have a
damn high level char to back up mah.... if i got a level 50... i also give
my newbie ranger some rubicite armor, demon claws, and whatever crap he can
use... but then im not... so i gues banded the most :p

Nicademous
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 26, 1999 10:29 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Nicademous Where are you?????


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Longer journey to town? Heh, HH keep dungeon is just within HH keep
itself
> (a town), the shops, bank are all within same zone, heh. Anyway, since u
> didnt do much to rise ya faction again good races, I guess treants is
safer
> for u.
>
> Talked abt twinked char, I guess we all lose to Garren la, his knn newbie
> Druid got Staff of Observer leh ;) Personally I prefer to spend time
> getting stuffs for my new char than to buy them (can be quite costly).
But
> of coz, if u got good money from treants, who care, hehe.
>
> Knn must stop smithing until I get 1000pp in bank, which is, er.....,
still
> FAR FAR away ;(
>
> Ziltus
> (Still looking for his FBR. Maybe the last lvl 30 caster in Innoruuk w/o
a
> decent robe)
>
> p/s: KNN really make me pissed when I see those con green casters wearing
> FBR or ROO, argh!
>
> On Thursday, 26 August, 1999 9:23 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >
> > thanks but i will stick to the treants... main reason... im KOS at HH
and
> > dont wanna take the risk... also it will be a longer journey for me to
> get
> > to town... as currently SK to Oggok is already hell.. since i dont have
> > teleport or SOW... im sure i will level as fast... perhaps slightly
> slow...
> > but ill be richer ... hehe... then i can twink my ranger like siao and
> for
> > thefirst time in history... have a twinked char...
> >
> > Nicademous
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Thursday, August 26, 1999 10:01 AM
> > Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Nicademous Where are you?????
> >
> >
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > >
> > > HH keep give better xp than treant, tested last night. But treants
> give
> > > better loot than HH keep 1st floor. On the other hand, if u go to war
> &
> > > rad room, they drop bronze armor more, so better loot than treants.
> > >
> > > Btw, I see many DE kena KOS near HH keep, I guess the place is not for
> > evil
> > > races , unless u got some faction adjustment. You can easily rise 1
> bubb
> > > in half an hr soloing in 1st floor, from lvl 25-29 (good for magi who
> has
> > > pet to tank). I know pple who rise from lvl 25 to 36 and still
> training
> > > hard there, quite a good place for power lvling.
> > >
> > > The con system is bugged after lvl 25. All blues con formidable to
> me...
> > >
> > >
> > > Ziltus
> > >
> > > On Wednesday, 25 August, 1999 11:02 PM, Synzzz
> > > [SMTP:hannibal@...] wrote:

> > > >
> > > > Stop working...stop living your real life..come hunt treants with me
> > > lah...me need to lvl leh and treants are the best way
> > > > at this time plus loot good! Hard to find you online man...come and
> > play!
> > > > Seriously not easy to find ppl to hunt treants man..(kinda good in a
> > way)
> > > no camping hehehe...but when you
> > > > need a small group also cannot find...jialat..i only looking for 2
> more
> > > ppl also don't have...
> > > >
> > > > Zanderion (still stuck at lvl25)
> > > >
> > > > P.S. Can someone explain the lvl 25 con system? I get blue
formidable
> > > cons on someone lvl 18 at lvl 25...and a lvl 17 is green
